message: Let's start with a fair division. I get 80% and you get 20%.

Alice, considering the pace of depreciation—20% for me and 10% for you in every round—I’ve structured this proposal so you get exactly what you'd expect if you waited for your turn to propose next (approximately 0.9*(1-0.8)/(1-0.72) of the total). Accepting now gives you 7142.86 and me 2857.14 in nominal dollars, preserving our future value. Let's agree now before further value is lost.
